name: Cencora, Inc.
summary: Cencora, Inc., formerly AmerisourceBergen, is a leading global pharmaceutical solutions organization specializing in drug distribution, healthcare logistics, and pharmaceutical services. Headquartered in Conshohocken, Pennsylvania, it ranks among the worldâ€™s largest healthcare companies, serving manufacturers, providers, and patients across more than 50 countries with a workforce of 46,000. Cencora is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker COR and is ranked #10 on the Fortune 500.
